PPLoc: Available on internal company intranet site.
activities: Liberty Mutual Group Inc. processes EEA and Swiss personal data relating to employees of Liberty Mutual Group Inc.’s subsidiaries in the EEA and Switzerland for purposes of global HR administration and management, including the following: facilitating global communication and providing for a global directory; planning and managing human resources on a global level; assisting employees in understanding their roles and responsibilities; facilitating managerial approvals and notifications; workflow management, such as assigning, managing, and administering projects that may be performed across countries; accounting, project costing and estimates; compensation analysis, decision-making and administration; performance, employee training, career advancement and secondment management; succession planning; security and employee authentication.  Liberty Mutual will also use European employee data for purposes relating to IT systems access and support, operating its ethics hotline, conducting internal investigations, and remedial matters pursuant to and as permitted by applicable law.
corpofftitle1: Chief Compliance Officer, SVP Corporate Legal
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
